metadata.synopsis: One-liner with a worker outside the Baldurs Mouth building
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to the male Dwarf worker outside of the Baldurs Mouth building.

0.speaker: Jarlath
0.text: Used to be much quieter round here... Much less profitable, mind, so it ain't all bad.

1.speaker: Jarlath
1.text: No time to chat, mate, sorry. Since Gortash donated this printing machine, we've had ridiculous volume to shift.
